entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
